concept.title: Stream Selector
concept.shortdesc: The Stream Selector passes data to different streams based on user-defined conditions. You can pass data to as many streams as you like. The Stream Selector passes data to all streams where the data matches the condition.

conbody.p: When you configure a condition for a stream, the Stream Selector creates an output node for the stage. When incoming data matches the condition for a stream, the Stream Selector passes the data to the stage connected to the output node. The Stream Selector uses a fallback action for data that does not match the conditions, but you can configure alternative actions.
